Class BinaryChromosome

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.doane.dugal.dea.Individual

  • public class BinaryChromosome
extends Individual
    Class representing a binary chromosome individual.
    Version:
    12/30/2014
    Author:
    Mark M. Meysenburg

    • Constructor Detail

      • BinaryChromosome

        public BinaryChromosome()
        Default constructor. Create a shell of a BinaryChromosome individual.

      • BinaryChromosome

        public BinaryChromosome(int length)
        Initializing constructor. Create a BinaryChromosome individual of the specified size, with all bits initialized randomly.
        Parameters:
        length - Number of bits in the individual.

      • BinaryChromosome

        public BinaryChromosome(BinaryChromosome ind)
        Copy constructor. Make this BinaryChromosome deep-copy identical to the parameter.
        Parameters:
        ind - BinaryChromosome object to mimic

    • Method Detail

      • getBitsAsInt

        public int getBitsAsInt(int lo,
                        int hi)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Get the value of a range of bits in the chromosome, as an int.
        Parameters:
        lo - index of starting bit in the range.
        hi - index of ending bit in the range.
        Returns:
        Integer value of the bits in the range [lo, hi]
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if hi is less than or equal to lo.

      • getBit

        public boolean getBit(int bit)
        The the value of a specified bit.
        Parameters:
        bit - Bit to get
        Returns:
        Value of the bit

      • setBit

        public void setBit(int bit,
                   boolean value)
        Set the specified bit to a specified value.
        Parameters:
        bit - Which bit to set.
        value - Value to set it to.

      • getLength

        public int getLength()
        Get the length of this individual's chromosome.
        Returns:
        Number of bits in the chromosome.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString(int lo,
                                 int hi)
        Helper method to get some subset of the bits as a string.
        Parameters:
        lo - lo bit of range to fetch
        hi - high bit of range to fetch
        Returns:
        String representation of bits in the range [lo, hi]
